A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was one of the worst Star Wars films since the Phantom menace... If you enjoy hand holding\, on screen characters explaining the movie to you\, and complete disgregard for any sort of suspense and tension ruined by poorly placed jokes then this is your movie! If not and you're not a child then steer clear. Maybe worth $5 ona. Discount day. \n\nA few scenes with some of the best visuals I have ever seen in a Star Wars Film does NOT make up for the awful story and complete lack of respect for the intellect of its audience.
